description: <p><span><span>Arthington Medical Centre has an Vacancy for4 -7 session Salaried General Practitioner to join our happy team located in the Suburbs of Leeds. We look after 6000 patients and this post has future Partnership potential and/or career progression for the right person. We are particuarly looking for a doctor who will compliment our team and enhance our practice. Current CQC rating of GOOD.We have an excellent reputation as supportive employers with our feet firmly placed on the ground and great sense of humour. </span></span></p>
title: Salaried GP
